name: Arcade Archives City CONNECTION
description:
'City CONNECTION' is an action game that was released from Jaleco in 1985.
Girl Clarisse drives 'Clarice car', and runs around the world in search of the ideal of man.


'Arcade Archives series' has faithfully reproduce the masterpiece of arcade games for PS4™ system. Also support PS4™ system features.
Players can share play screens and video with the SHARE feature, and players can also compete with other players for score online ranking.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

Additional hardware required for Interconnectivity.

1-2 players
DUALSHOCK®4
Interconnectivity PS4™ • PS Vita
1080i HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
